document_data.name: Alandor River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Alandor River''' was a major river in [[Amn]].
document_data.Description:
The Alandor was a slow-moving and wide river. Beyond Crimmor, the barges continued east to [[Lake Weng]], but the River Road did not.

The waters of the river were green and had a mild smell.

The river flooded in the early spring. The lands south of the river were good for grazing.

The waters of the Alandor were full of many kinds of fishes, the most common of which were [[silverwink minnow]]s. These were eaten by the larger [[brownscale]]s, which were the food source for [[Alandor eel]]s.
document_data.Geography: The river began at [[Minsor Vale]] on the southeastern point of Lake Weng. From there, it flowed west, passing Crimmor before emptying into the [[Sea of Swords]] at Athkatla,
